mapper.update: update aim set total = #{total} where aimid = #{aimid} and userid = #{userid};
update aim set achieveaim = #{achieveaim} where aimid = #{aimid};
mapper.delete: delete from aim where aimid = #{aimid} and userid = #{userid};
mapper.select: select catename from aim where aimdate = #{aimdate} and catename = #{catename} and userid = #{userid};

select aimid, moneytype, catename, total as aim_money, userid, ifnull((select sum(total) from account where account.userid = aim.userid and account.catename = aim.catename and account.moneytype = aim.moneytype and left(account.date, 7) = aim.aimdate), 0) as total from aim where aimdate = #{aimdate} and moneytype = #{moneytype};
